name: wx-read
description: A simple Electron application for Weixin Read
author: Binghuan Zhang <esteponawondering@gmail.com>

scripts.gen:icns: bash -c 'ICON_SRC=asset/app.png; ICONSET=build/icons.iconset; mkdir -p "$ICONSET" && sips -z 16 16 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_16x16.png" && sips -z 32 32 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_16x16@2x.png" && sips -z 32 32 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_32x32.png" && sips -z 64 64 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_32x32@2x.png" && sips -z 128 128 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_128x128.png" && sips -z 256 256 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_128x128@2x.png" && sips -z 256 256 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_256x256.png" && sips -z 512 512 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_256x256@2x.png" && sips -z 512 512 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_512x512.png" && sips -z 1024 1024 "$ICON_SRC" --out "$ICONSET/icon_512x512@2x.png" && iconutil -c icns "$ICONSET" -o build/app.icns && cp "$ICON_SRC" build/icon.png'
scripts.pack-mac: npm run gen:icns && npm run build && npx electron-builder -m --x64
scripts.pack-mas: npm run gen:icns && npm run build && npx electron-builder -m --arm64
scripts.pack-mac-arm: npm run gen:icns && npm run build && npx electron-builder -m --arm64
scripts.pack-mac-arm-signed: npm run gen:icns && npm run build && npx electron-builder -m --arm64 -p always
